data.text: @Cjsbest1 @_unisophia @HamEggsnSam What do they know that they don’t want us to know? Red flag! when an entity pushes hard for ppl to take something they won’t impose on themselves.
@HamEggsnSam @Cybraxas Immer wieder der ausgelutschte, lange widerlegte Quatsch. #QuerdenkerSindKacke

@goldenthriller @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 It really doesn't take that long to put together. The WEF literally wrote a book about it. And anyone can confirm that the assets are in place. 

And yes, I think it's pretty important to understand the power structures that practically shape our perception of reality.

@goldenthriller @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 So a relatively small group effectively controls the drugs, the regulators, the narrative and it's not hard to imagine that they do some lobbying. 

When you see how many of these controlled corps are associated with WEF, it all makes sense.

@goldenthriller @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 One of which, starts with a V, has the controlling share of the other. When someone owns that much of the shares, they can effectively bully the corp into whatever they want.

@goldenthriller @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 Didn't take much time to follow the money. You can do it too. Type into a Google search "Pfizer shareholders", "Moderna shareholders", rinse, repeat. You'll see the the largest shareholders are the same two investment firms.

@jrmy_tu @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 the irony of you spending your life making up conspiracies when clearly you value it so much that you’re afraid the government has made a vaccine to take it from you
@goldenthriller @HamEggsnSam @Jasonhillard2 And one of those investment firms owns the controlling share of the other AND boasts an organizational structure that keeps its ownership secret.
